entry.title: Three officers commit murder and only one is charged with wanton...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Three officers commit murder and only one is charged with wanton endangerment on a 15k bond. We have comrades still in jail right now for standing up and fighting back with higher bonds than that! No justice at all for #BreonnaTaylor. This is a failure. The system has failed her, her family, and the entire Black community at large. Pray, conjure, summon, manifest; call in whatever you believe in for protection, love, and power over Louisville. #ifwedontgetnojustice #theydontgetnopeace
https://apnews.com/28a283922de8784f6fca5c42fe8e5bca

entry.title: https://www.facebook.com/PJUnidos1/videos/1446566685533466/
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

https://www.facebook.com/PJUnidos1/videos/1446566685533466/

Padres & Jóvenes Unidos was live.

The company, Palantir Technologies, is ICE’s technology backbone, providing the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants. Palantir’s tool...s have been used to conduct mass workplace raids, including the biggest raid in US history in which 680 people were detained in Mississippi. Palantir moved its headquarters to Colorado this month. Let's show them that they are not welcome in our city and state! We will not let Palantir profile our people and separate our families.

entry.title: “When she wanted to switch sides of the sidewalk when Black...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“When she wanted to switch sides of the sidewalk when Black men were around, I explained. When she told me I was a natural at rugby because of my “athletic genes,” I explained. When she touched my hair without asking, I explained. When she didn’t understand why the police made me nervous, I explained. I explained, and explained and explained... But she never seemed to learn anything besides certain words to avoid, or what coils she couldn’t undo. She just became an expert in her performance of an ally.”

https://saltyworld.net/youre-not-the-ally-you-think-you-a…/…

saltyworld.net

You're Not The Ally You Think You Are

"We must understand that empathy that is conditional on outrageous brutality will not further liberation.""We must understand that empathy that is conditional on outrageous brutality will not further liberation."

entry.title: ALL LOVE to and solidarity with arrested anti-racist organizers! #CALLTOACTION ...

Saturday, 9/19
12PM
West Capitol Building steps.

entry.title: On Thursday, September 17, police agencies in the Denver area...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

On Thursday, September 17, police agencies in the Denver area arrested anti-war organizers in a coordinated assault. Those arrested included leaders in the struggle demanding justice for Elijah McClain, who was brutally murdered by the Aurora Police Department. They are still in jail, with the exception of one person. They are facing multiple felony charges and years in prison in an obvious frame-up aimed at stopping the movement for justice for Elijah McClain.

Russell Ruch w...as arrested while in a parking lot at a Home Depot. An hour later, five police cars surrounded and arrested Lillian House while she was driving. In the afternoon, S.W.A.T. teams arrived at Joel Northam’s home and arrested him. Eliza Lucero was also arrested. All four are members of the Party for Socialism and Liberation. Also arrested were Terrance Roberts, co-founder of the Frontline Party for Revolutionary Action, and others may have also been arrested.

They are facing multiple serious felony charges and many misdemeanors including the bizarre and ludicrous charge of “kidnapping,” all because they have organized large Black Lives Matter protests. This is a major political attack on the whole movement and the PSL. We will mount a mass campaign to defeat these phony charges and win their freedom. This attack on the Denver anti-racist movement and the PSL is part of a concerted national assault on the Black Lives Matter movement, an attack driven directly from the White House, from Governor’s mansions, and from local police chiefs and police departments around the country.

We will not be afraid! We have the power of the people on our side! Stand up, fight back!

Join us for a rally and march beginning at the west steps of the State Capitol building in Denver at noon on Saturday, September 19.

See More

SAT, SEP 19

Drop the Charges! Solidarity with Arrested Anti-Racist Organizers

Colorado State Capitol

· DenverCauses · 1,219 people

entry.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
entry.content:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

entry.title: #CallToAction...
entry.content:
#CallToAction
HAPPENING NOW: Your mayor and council members are meeting to discuss the 2-year contract with #DenverPoliceDepartment that increases their budget in the second year. This budget increase allows for MORE funds devoted to the chemical weapons they terrorize our city with! They plan to quietly vote on it tomorrow 9/3 with only online public comment that they can control the narrative on with the click of a button. Contact your council member and Michael B. Hancock TODAY and let them know as their constituent you DEMAND they do not support the following:

❌Any Collective Bargaining Agreement with DPD longer than 1 year.

❌Any agreement that gives ANY financial increases or incentives to police.

❌Any agreement that does not require police to be financially responsible for their attorneys and settlements in any cases of alleged excessive force or race related discrimination

#DEFUNDPOLICE #DEFENDBLACKLIFE

entry.title: Peace and blessings, family. Securing justice for our communities is critical. Still, we must never normalize watching...
entry.content: Peace and blessings, family. Securing justice for our communities is critical. Still, we must never normalize watching and reading about any violence enacted on our friends and loved ones, pieces of ourselves, on the internet. We give thanks to the ancestors and higher power that guided #JacobBlake back to share more joyful moments with his children like the one in this picture we are intentionally sharing instead of that horrific video. Today we are reminded that it is an essential component of #Blackliberation to take pause and hold space for our whole selves —body, mind, and spirit. To choose healing. #Blackhealingisrevolutionary #BlackLivesMatter

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
